text:
Stylight | Full Stack and Data Engineers | Munich, Germany | Onsite | Relocation + Visa Assistance

Stylight is a mission-driven company that combines a great workplace, exceptional colleagues and hard problems. Our culture is key to our success and has helped us attract and retain stunning colleagues, making work at Stylight insanely satisfying. We may be rooted in Munich, but we live everywhere online. Interested in joining us? We are looking for engineers who want to make an impact, having experience e.g. in Javascript, Python, Java, AWS, ReactJS etc.

Check out our Jobs Page: http://jobs.stylight.com/Jobs/ and Tech Blog: https://tech.stylight.com/

We're looking forward to meeting you!
